safecaR: Access NHTSA Vehicle Safety Data from R

Overview

The safecaR R package provides a tidy interface to NHTSA APIs, including crash ratings, recalls, and complaints.

Installation

You can install the latest release of litr on github with the following:

# install.packages("remotes") if you don't have it
remotes::install_github("c-a-s-t-l-e/safecaR")

# or via CRAN
install.packages("safecaR")

Getting started
